Premium Features

Experience Fortnite like never before with our enhanced gameplay systems

24/7 EU Servers

Low latency servers running constantly with optimized performance for the best gameplay experience across Europe.

VBucks on Kill

Earn VBucks for each elimination, redeemable for exclusive cosmetics in our custom item shop. More kills = more rewards!

Competitive Late-Game

Enhanced end-game with moving zones, increased mat cap, and arena-style settings for intense final circles.

OG Weapons Only

Only Chapter 1 Season 8 weapons available - Pump Shotgun, Scar, Bolt-Action, and more. No unwanted additions!

Custom Lootpool

Carefully curated lootpool matching the original season with balanced spawn rates for optimal gameplay.

Advanced Anti-Cheat

Multi-layered anti-cheat measures to ensure fair gameplay. Regular updates to stay ahead of cheaters.

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions

How do I join the server?

To join our servers, you need to download our custom launcher from the Discord server. After installing, create an account and you'll be able to connect to any of our EU servers.

Is this project legal?

Our project operates under fair use as a non-commercial, educational server. We don't charge for access or distribute copyrighted material. All in-game purchases use our custom VBucks system, not Epic's.

How does the VBucks system work?

You earn VBucks by getting eliminations (250 VBucks per kill). These can be spent in our custom item shop which rotates daily with Chapter 1 Season 8 cosmetics.

What are the system requirements?

Our custom client has similar requirements to the original Fortnite: Windows 10/11, Intel Core i5-7300U or equivalent, 8GB RAM, and a DirectX 11 compatible GPU with 2GB VRAM. The total download size is approximately 40GB.

Ready to Ascend?
